snippet.title: Wanagiri - Visual Novel Trailer
snippet.description:
Wanagiri is a short visual novel where you play as Kamila, who accidentally isekai'ed to an uncompleted book that your friend wrote. How will you end the story, and will you be back there again someday?

(ID)
Wanagiri adalah sebuah visual novel singkat dimana kamu berperan sebagai Kamila, seorang gadis yang tiba-tiba masuk ke buku temanmu yang belum selesai ditulis, siapa yang akan kamu temui disana, dan apakah kamu akan kembali ke sana lagi suatu saat?
---------------
Download WANAGIRI on Itch.io
https://bentala-arealis.itch.io/wanagiri
------------
Director : IkiAkuHind
English translator: Dvvna_
CG illustration: Sarioraa
------------
Music and background assets from Pixabay
-----------
Bentala (A)Realis is a group of artists who like to create something fantasy that focuses on story-driven media. We aim to represent the local touch and our tradition into a work of art.
